tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE chatbot_personalization (
    personalization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    personalization_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    last_interacted_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE chatbot_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE chatbot_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE personalized_interactions (
    personalized_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    personalized_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ChatbotHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_id INT,
    chatbot_response TEXT,
    response_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ChatbotErrors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_id INT,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_time TIMESTAMP
);
